parameters.content:
# BEST PRACTICE. IMPORTANT !!!!

## 1. Always use "execute only once" on Linkedin API nodes !

### This way if by mistake you are putting this node after a node that outputs 100 elements you avoid upsetting the Linkedin Rate Limits and endangering your account.

## 2. Use "PIN data" while you are testing, 

### To avoid calling Linkedin API many times and rising suspicion on your account.

## 3. Use "Wait" nodes between calls with Random values

### This way you simulate human like behavior

## 4. For "paginated" functions like "get comments" or "get posts for profile" Use the delay parameters

### This types of functions are getting large amount of data so we have to simulate human behavior. 

### You have 2 additional params in these functions. Example: "min_delay": "2",
  "max_delay": "5"). These will randomize the delay, simulating a human that is clicking on "show more comments" on the page.

value.My_Reply_Sent: ={{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.userId == $('Get my LN user ID').item.json.profile_id}}
